body.name: Maxi-Cosi Pria All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, All-in-One Seating System: Rear-Facing, from 4-40 pounds; Forward-Facing to 65 pounds; and up to 100 pounds in Booster Mode, Sonar Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 30 mins
features: 3-IN-1 CAR SEAT: 3-in-1 protective car seat is designed to convert into 3 positions (rear-facing, front-facing, and booster mode) for children to use from birth to 10 years of age
ADJUSTABLE SEAT: Wide range of adaptability with 3-position recline, 5 headrest heights, and shoulder harness
SUPREME COMFORT: Provides supreme comfort with soft-to-touch cushions that are easy to remove, machine washable, and dryer safe
EASY INSTALLATION: Includes 2 removable cupholders for toddlers to hold drinks and snacks and is easy to install into any vehicle with the 1-click latch connectors
HEIGHT AND WEIGHT RECOMMENDATIONS: Rear-facing: 5-40 pounds and 19-40 inches; Forward-facing: 22-65 pounds and 29-49 inches; Booster: 40-100 pounds and 43-57 inches
body.description: Keep your little one snug and secure from the very first ride home with the Pria All-in-One Convertible Car Seat. Made to keep up with your growing family: rear-facing (4–40 lbs. and 19"–40"), forward-facing (22–65 lbs. and 29"–49"), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs. and 43"–52"). Pria is designed for your child’s comfort but includes conveniences for you as well. Raise the integrated QuikFit headrest and harness system with 1 hand to properly fit your child when they seem to grow overnight. In-and-out harness holders keep straps out of the way when buckling or unbuckling your squirmy one, making it easier and quicker to get on your way. ReclineFit provides 3 reclining positions for a relaxing ride, plus an easier fit in your car. The infant pillow and cushions provide extra support and can be easily removed without re-threading the harness. Select color options feature PureCosi™ fabrics and padding made without wool. Plus, all fabrics are machine-washable and-dryer safe. This all-in-one car seat is ready to journey through the years ahead as you create memories with your little one. Rear-facing (4–40 lbs. and 19"–40"), forward-facing (22–65 lbs. and 29"–49"), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs. and 43"–52").

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pria All-in-One Convertible Car Seat ntroducing the Pria All-in-One convertible car seat, baby's first and only car seat. Surround your child in comfort and safety from the first ride home. What’s in a Name, You Ask? Just like the care you take to name your new little bundle of joy; we take great care in choosing names that best explain what you get with our products. And if our car seats have everything you need “all in one”, why not come out and say it? So, here it goes – our convertible car seats will now carry the name “All-in-One”. From birth to ten years, you get everything you need in a single car seat to keep your child cozy and safe. All in one is all you need.

Safety Where You Need It GCell patented foam absorbs crash energy and protects your child’s head where it’s needed most in a side impact crash. All-in-One Convertible Car Seat Designed to grow with your child and provides a perfect fit from birth to 10 years (4-100 lbs.) Superior Comfort Soft-to-touch cushions and premium fabrics and padding throughout, provide the most comfort during the journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was just over 4 and a half pounds when we brought her home and she fit perfectly. It adjusts to their size all the way up to toddler years. It is such a a beautiful car seat and well cushioned for comfort. It seems to be durable and has a simple latch in design so it's easy to install. The only downside is that it is quite large but I love it and would absolutely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best car seat ever!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this car seat for my first born for three years already and I bought another one for my second child! I really recommend it because it is very comfortable and my kids love it a lot.it also looks nice and expensive. Easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy car seat
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great quality and easy to install and assembly. It’s super cushioned and the color scheme looks really nice and high end. There is a weird line that came on the head rest part put I’m sure the more it gets used you won’t be able to notice it. Love the dual cup holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: After getting a recommendation from a fellow Mama. I looked into this car seat Vs other designer known brands and settled on this. I purchased a second one for the grandparents to keep in their car. It’s comfortable and looks sleek. I got the black color and the navy with a little shimmer. The navy was more affordable and actually looked better than the black in person. I’ve been sticking with this brand for strollers etc now. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong Chemical Smell
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice car seat and my 22-month old loves the visibility and comfort. Unfortunately it had a very strong chemical smell out of the box that did not dissipate after airing it out for several days prior to installation. Once in the car, the smell is noticable the second we open the door. Called customer service and they immediately ordered me replacement padding/covers at no charge. Just bummed they say it will take 10-15 days to arrive as we are all subjected to this harsh chemical smell in the meantime. Also, the cup holders are a joke. They are TINY. I was looking forward to being able to put my little's water bottle within reach so he could be more independent while I drive, but I don't think these things could even hold a airplane cup they're so narrow. Overall, a good, but not great seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If there’s anything to add to your baby registry, it’s this car seat. I switched my daughter to it when she was 16 pounds and I wish I had sooner.It is so much more cushioned than the infant seat, much easier to adjust and install.The easy lift harness adjustment is the best part of this seat, you no longer have to uninstall the car seat to adjust the harness straps and reinstall. You can simply lift them while your kid is in the car seat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and install. The straps rarely get tangled and it seems very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with this car seat!
reviews.reviewText: We were in need of a second car seat for our second vehicle and have only ever used a Nuna car seat. I was a bit nervous about trying something different, but this Maxi Cosi Pria All in One checked off so many boxes - safety, quality, longevity (only seat we will ever need) and style. Got it installed using the latch method, rear facing, in under a minute. Would be easy to move to a different vehicle if absolutely needed. Once installed the seat felt very sturdy and secure.We took it out for a short drive to see how our 13 month old liked it - the good news is she LOVED it! She had a bit more moving room in terms of the sides of the seat, but was well secured in her harness. The cup holders were a plus and she figured out how to sit her water cup in them right away.Have not had to take apart to wash fabric yet, so will have to give an update down the road. Overall very very happy with our purchase. Maxi Cosi does it again. Really feel like you get a ton of features and quality for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy bonito y de buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: Se ven de buena calidad los materiales y resistentes. Los primeros días si tiene un olor fuerte como a plástico que va desapareciendo con el uso.
Funciona muy bien y es muy segura para el bebé.

No se me hizo tan fácil de instalar a diferencia de otra que tengo de la marca gracco, lo que me gustó es que está bastante acolchonada de la parte donde va la cabeza. El diseño está bastante ergonómico para el bebé y los colores están lindos aunque como lei en otros comentario tiene un olor muy intenso a textil nuevo pero supongo que se irá quitando con el tiempo.
Una silla bastante cómoda para mi hija, se adecua perfectamente a cualquier automóvil y sobre todo se ve que brinda comodidad y seguridad al ocupante
